name: Wild Cards (NiamhG)
description:
An unfinished card-based puzzle game for Galway Game Jam 2022.

(Some art assets are placeholders we never got to replace. Levels are not implemented.)

Credits

Code: Maicon Santana

Art: Niamh Germaine

Music: Conor Callan (Instagram: sea_squared_guitar, Soundcloud: sea_squared)

Sound FX: Matt Sween
